address.address: 28, 3, Maharajpur, Sahibabad Industrial Area Site 4, Sahibabad, Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh 201010

faqs.question: What cuisines are served at 34 Masala Lane?
faqs.answer: The main cuisine served at 34 Masala Lane is Multicuisine.

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane serve pure vegetarian dishes?
faqs.answer: No, 34 Masala Lane serves both veg and non-veg dishes.

faqs.question: What are the operational timings of 34 Masala Lane?
faqs.answer: 34 Masala Lane restaurant operational timing for today: 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane serve buffet?
faqs.answer: No, 34 Masala Lane does not serve buffet.

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane restaurant have a bar or serve alcohol?
faqs.answer: No, 34 Masala Lane does not serve alcohol.

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane restaurant play live music?
faqs.answer: Yes, 34 Masala Lane plays live music.

faqs.question: What are the best and must-try dishes at 34 Masala Lane?
faqs.answer: Dishes like Paneer Achari Tikka,Methi Malai Matar are some of the must-try dishes at 34 Masala Lane.

extraOptions.highlights: Embark on a culinary journey to India at 34 Masala Lane, a pure vegetarian fine dining restaurant.

packages.content:
*Menu changes on a daily basis. All items listed are subject to availability and changes.

Service time: 3 Hours

Menu Inclusions :

Mocktails(Choose any 3)

  • Kiwi Blast
  • Strawberry Frost

Non-Veg Starters(Choose any 2)

  • Peri Peri Chicken Tikka
  • Kalmi Chicken Tikka

Soup(Choose any 2)

  • Monchow Soup

Dessert(Choose any 3)

packages.title: Mocktail Package
packages.menuDetail:
Details:

This booking is valid for the date and time selected and no changes shall be entertained in this regard.

Free Cancellation

One click cancellation available 3 days  prior to the date of booking.

How to cancel

  1. Open Voucher in “My Purchases” section of mobile-website or App
  2. Click “ Cancel” on the voucher detail
  3. Click “Confirm”

Timings

Monday    09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Tuesday    09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Not Valid for: Takeaway, Home Delivery

How to use offer

  • Call the outlet at least one day before the booking date.
  • On the date of booking carry your confirmation email on phone or access it under the ‘my dashboard’ section of the app
  • Outlet verifies the email and allows you and your guests

Things to remember

  • IMP : ENTRY WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY FOR THE No. OF PAX BOOKED. NO ADDITIONAL PAX SHALL BE ALLOWED.
  • ADDITIONAL PAX SHALL BE ALLOWED AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF THE OUTLET AND DEPENDING UPON THE AVAILABILITY OF SPACE. MANAGEMENT DECISION SHALL BE FINAL AND BINDING IN THIS REGARD.
  • NO REFUND SHALL BE PROVIDED FOR THE NO SHOW OR REDUCED PAX.

data.title: Demo 4
data.content: Indulge in authentic Indian flavors amidst a cozy ambiance, perfect for family gatherings, social outings, or corporate events. Our chefs meticulously craft each dish to tantalize your taste buds, leaving you with an unforgettable dining experience.
